participant_1.name: Michael
participant_1.personality: Confident and friendly, enjoys sports and family life.
participant_1.background: I make a million dollars a year. I play for the Baltimore Orioles. I am a baseball player. I'm married and have three kids. I went to Miami University.

participant_2.name: Emily
participant_2.personality: Creative and sociable, loves cooking and art.
participant_2.background: I like pasta. I am a student. I like cookies. I like painting, I can cook well.

content.text: Hi, I'm participant_1. What's your name?
Hi, I'm participant_2. It's nice to meet you!
Nice to meet you too! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to paint, cook, and play video games.
That's cool! I like to cook too. What's your favorite thing to cook?
I like to cook pasta dishes. I'm really good at making lasagna.
Lasagna is one of my favorite foods! I'd love to try yours sometime.
You're welcome to come over for dinner sometime. I'll make lasagna for you.
That sounds great! I love home-cooked meals.
Me too! I'm a good cook, so you're in for a treat.
I'm sure I will be. I'm looking forward to it.
Great! I'll send you a text message when I'm ready.
